parameter.value: I don't have a job, I'm too old for that. I'm captain of this ship, but I don't see it as a job.
Lucas Harzon is the current captain of the Aurora. He inherited it after his father, Eric.
Me and Eric were friends. When he passed away, Lucas Harzon was too young to sail the Aurora, and therefor did I sail it for a few years.
I have sailed the Aurora for a couple of years. This was because when its captain Eric died, his son Lucas was too young to take over business.
We are at Agatone at the moment.
I may sail you to Adanac and Casteldine and the sage Omere.
I can sail you to Adanac and Casteldine and the sage Omere.
Jerry sells some food and a few runes.
Andreas is quite famous because of the battle arena he founded.
The king can't catch me out on the sea, so I don't have to obey his laws.
Well, a friend of mine, captain Harzon, is currently 98 years old. I knew his father.
Me and my ship is always at your service, |PLAYERNAME|!
